text: Biondia chinensis is a species of plant in the family Apocynaceae, first described in 1905.Schlechter, Friedrich Richard Rudolf. 1905. Botanische Jahrbücher für Systematik, Pflanzengeschichte und Pflanzengeographie 36(5, Beibl. 82): 91 in German and Latin It is endemic to China, known from Gansu and Shaanxi Provinces.Flora of China Vol. 16 Page 224 秦岭藤 qin ling teng Biondia chinensis Schlechter, Bot. Jahrb. Syst. 36 (Beibl. 82): 91. 1905. The species is listed as vulnerable.China Plant Specialist Group 2004. Biondia chinensis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 20 August 2007. ==References== Category:Endemic flora of China Category:Biondia Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Plants described in 1905 Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Biondia chinensis
